content.title: Welcome to the HORN Cluster!
content.text:
Join the discord and check out the other tabs for more information.

Have fun!

content.title: HORN In Game Rules
content.text:
1. The areas around the obelisks are not to be built at. If you do your structures might get removed by admins or destroyed by boss fights.

2. Bosses are to be spawned around the obelisks and fought and killed there, so no bases or tames of other players are in danger. For underwater bosses there will be a boss fight teleporter.

3. Don't grief other players by drowning them, luring dinos to their bases, etc. Bannable.

4. Don't kill dinos other players are taming. Accidents can happen of course, but don't make it a habit.

5. Don't block big resource spots, cave entrances or artifacts or you might get asked to move or your structures get removed. Building in artifact caves is allowed if the artifacts in the cave are still accessible for other players.

6. No spamming to claim base spots or spots in general. No spam around the base, this is PvE. If you want protection put up a bubble.

7. You can glitch yourself under the map or build in the mesh if you want but if you have a problem and an admin can't help you there that is your problem then.

8. If you set up a teleporter at a nice resource or artifact location just make it public so everyone can benefit.

9. Always equip the dinos you use with Awesome Trackers so u can recover them from glitched / meshed spots yourself.

10. Don't push character, tribe or tame names too far (for example being racist, sexist, ...). A bit of fun is alright of course.

11. Don't build unnecessary structures and trap all dinos you don't need to be out to lower strain on the server.

12. Kill all dinos you knocked out and don't want to tame and pick up traps after taming.

content.title: General Settings
content.text:
20x XP

10x Harvesting

50x Taming

500x Maturation

Dino Harvesting Boosted

Dino Spawns 1,6x

Wild dino damage and health is boosted so you don't fall asleep

content.title: Ark Shop
content.text: Press F3 to open the Shop. WIP

content.title: Structure Limits
content.text:
Certain structures can only be placed in limited quantity


Plugin commands:

/showlimits (Chat) - Display current limits and amount of placed structures.
/showcluster (Chat) - Display amount of connected structures of the structure you're looking at.
